row.process:
: DEFINE &ARRAY#, STRING, 1000 : SET &COUNT# = 1 : SET &ITR# = 1 : SET &ARRAY#[&COUNT#] = "$"
: DEFINE &OBJ_ADR#, STRING, 1000 : SET &OBJ_ADR#[&COUNT#] = "A"
: WHILE &ARRAY#[&ITR#] <> "" : DEFINE &KEYARR#, STRING, 1000 : DEFINE &OCRARR#, UNSIGNED, 1000 : SET &CNTR1# = 1
: SET &JSON# = JSON_GET_VALUE(&UC4RB_AIOPS_JSON_LOAD#,"&ARRAY#[&ITR#]") : SET &STRING_TYPE# = JSON_GET_TYPE( &JSON#, '$') : IF &STRING_TYPE# = "array" : SET &LPR# = 0 : SET &FLG# = 0 : SET &HND1#=JSON_TO_PROCESS(&JSON#,"$[*]",PATH) : PROCESS &HND1# : SET &PATH#=GET_PROCESS_LINE(&HND1#) : SET &TYPE# = JSON_GET_TYPE(&JSON#, '&PATH#') : SET &LPR# = FORMAT(&LPR#,"0") : IF &TYPE# = "object" OR "array" : SET &COUNT# = &COUNT# + 1 : SET &ARRAY#[&COUNT#] = "&ARRAY#[&ITR#][&LPR#]" : SET &OBJ_ADR#[&COUNT#] = "&OBJ_ADR#[&ITR#]$&LPR#" : ELSE : SET &VALUE#=JSON_GET_VALUE(&JSON#,"$[&LPR#]") : IF &TYPE# = "boolean" : IF &VALUE# = "1" : SET &VALUE# = "true" : ELSE : SET &VALUE# = "false" : ENDIF : ENDIF : SET &KEY_UC# = "&OBJ_ADR#[&ITR#]$&LPR#" : SET &KEY_UC# = STR_SUB(&KEY_UC#, " ", "") : SET &KEY_UC#=CONV_UC(&KEY_UC#) : SET &LEN#=STR_LENGTH(&KEY_UC#) : IF &LEN# > 30 : P "Variable &&&KEY_UC## can not be published as length exceeds 32 characters." : ELSE : PUBLISH &VALUE#, "&KEY_UC##",TOP : ENDIF : ENDIF : SET &LPR# = &LPR# + 1 : ENDPROCESS : CLOSE_PROCESS &HND1# : ELSE : SET &HND#=JSON_TO_PROCESS(&JSON#,"@",KEYS) : PROCESS &HND# : SET &KEY#=GET_PROCESS_LINE(&HND#) : SET &LEN#=STR_LENGTH(&KEY#) : IF &LEN# >= 3 : SET &VAL# = STR_SUB(&KEY#, " ", "") : SET &VAL# = SUBSTR(&VAL#,1,3) : ELSE : SET &VAL# = &KEY# : ENDIF : SET &VAL# = STR_TRIM(&VAL#) : SET &VAL#=CONV_UC(&VAL#) : SET &SEARCH# = FIND(&KEYARR#[], &VAL#) : IF &SEARCH# <> 0 : SET &OCRARR#[&SEARCH#] = &OCRARR#[&SEARCH#] + 1 : ELSE : SET &KEYARR#[&CNTR1#] = &VAL# : SET &OCRARR#[&CNTR1#] = 1 : SET &SEARCH# = &CNTR1# : SET &CNTR1# = &CNTR1# + 1 : ENDIF : SET &RET#=FORMAT(&OCRARR#[&SEARCH#],"0") : SET &STRING_TYPE# = JSON_GET_TYPE( &JSON#, "$.['&KEY#']") : IF &STRING_TYPE# = "object" OR "array" : SET &COUNT# = &COUNT# + 1 : SET &ARRAY#[&COUNT#] = "&ARRAY#[&ITR#].['&KEY#']" : SET &OBJ_ADR#[&COUNT#] = "&OBJ_ADR#[&ITR#]_&VAL#&RET#" : ELSE : SET &VALUE#=JSON_GET_VALUE(&JSON#,"$.['&KEY#']") : IF &STRING_TYPE# = "boolean" : IF &VALUE# = "1" : SET &VALUE# = "true" : ELSE : SET &VALUE# = "false" : ENDIF : ENDIF : SET &KEY_UC# = "&OBJ_ADR#[&ITR#]_&KEY#" : SET &KEY_UC# = STR_SUB(&KEY_UC#, " ", "") : SET &LEN#=STR_LENGTH(&KEY_UC#) : IF &LEN# > 30 : SET &KEY_UC# = "&OBJ_ADR#[&ITR#]_&VAL#&RET#" : ENDIF : SET &KEY_UC#=CONV_UC(&KEY_UC#) : SET &LEN#=STR_LENGTH(&KEY_UC#) : IF &LEN# > 30 : P "Variable &&&KEY_UC## can not be published as length exceeds 32 characters." : ELSE : PUBLISH &VALUE#, "&KEY_UC##",TOP : ENDIF : ENDIF : ENDPROCESS : CLOSE_PROCESS &HND# : ENDIF : SET &ITR# = &ITR#+1 : ENDWHILE
